text: aur jab unhen hamaaree spasht aayaten sunaee jaatee hai, to inakaar karanevaalon ke cheharon par tumhen naagavaaree prateet hotee hai. lagata hai ki abhee ve un logon par toot padege jo unhen hamaaree aayaten sunaate hai. kah do, "kya main tumhe isase buree cheez kee khabar doon? aag hai vah - allaah ne inakaar karanevaalon se usee ka vaada kar rakha hai - aur vah bahut hee bura thikaana hai.
